languages.text: "Я рад, что обрел столь щедр{mf|ого|ую} и надежн{mf|ого|ую} покровител{mf|я|ьницу}. Разумеется, ваш протекторат может рассчитывать на Футфоле на особые преференции, как я вам и обещал".
"I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."
languages.original_text: "Я рад, что обрел столь щедр{mf|ого|ую} и надежн{mf|ого|ую} покровител{mf|я|ьницу}. Разумеется, ваш протекторат может рассчитывать на Футфоле на особые преференции, как я вам и обещал".

traits.locale_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable {mf|patron|patroness}. Naturally, your trade empire can count on Footfall offering the special preference I promised you before."
"I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable {mf|patron|patroness}. Naturally, your trade empire can count on Footfall offering the special preference I promised you before."
"I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your trade empire can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."
"I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your trade empire can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."
"I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

languages.text: 「これほど寛大で信頼できる支援者に出会えて嬉しいよ。当然、君の保護国はフットフォールが以前約束した特別な配慮をするので期待していてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

traits.locale_text: 「これほど寛大で信頼できる支援者に出会えて嬉しいよ。当然、君の保護国はフットフォールが以前約束した特別な配慮をするので期待していてくれ」

languages.text: “我很高兴找到了如此慷慨可靠的赞助人。当然，您的王朝也会从落脚港获得我之前承诺过的特殊优待。”
languages.original_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴找到了如此慷慨可靠的赞助人。当然，您的王朝也会从落脚港获得我之前承诺过的特殊优待。”

languages.text: «Me alegro de haber encontrado a {mf|un patrón tan generoso|una patrona tan generosa} y responsable. Dé por hecho que, por su protección, Paso le ofrecerá la consideración especial que le prometí antes».
languages.original_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

traits.locale_text: «Me alegro de haber encontrado a {mf|un patrón tan generoso|una patrona tan generosa} y responsable. Dé por hecho que, por su protección, Paso le ofrecerá la consideración especial que le prometí antes».

languages.text: « Je suis ravi d'avoir trouvé {mf|un protecteur|une protectrice} aussi fiable et {mf|généreux|généreuse}. Bien sûr, votre protectorat peut compter sur un traitement de faveur de la part de Castel, comme je vous l'ai promis. »
languages.original_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis ravi d'avoir trouvé {mf|un protecteur|une protectrice} aussi fiable et {mf|généreux|généreuse}. Bien sûr, votre protectorat peut compter sur un traitement de faveur de la part de Castel, comme je vous l'ai promis. »

languages.text: "Ich bin froh, dass ich einen so großzügigen und verlässlichen Patron gefunden habe. Natürlich kann Euer Protektorat wie versprochen auf besondere Unterstützung durch Footfall bauen."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin froh, dass ich einen so großzügigen und verlässlichen Patron gefunden habe. Natürlich kann Euer Protektorat wie versprochen auf besondere Unterstützung durch Footfall bauen."

languages.text: "Böylesine cömert ve sözüne güvenilir bir hami buldum ya, ne mutlu bana. Hâliyle Protektoranız, size söz verdiğim özel ilgi hususunda Binliman'a güvenebilir."
languages.original_text: "I'm glad I've found such a generous and reliable patron. Naturally, your protectorate can count on Footfall offering the special consideration I promised you before."

traits.locale_text: "Böylesi cömert ve güvenilir bir hami bulduğuma sevindim. Protektoranız, doğal olarak size öncesinde söz verdiğim özel ilgi konusunda Binliman'a güvenebilir."
